review:
Dr Veena is an excellent dentist and friendly.    I am very content with the treatment I recieved,everything was explained clearly before the treatment.It was truly a professional care throughout the treatment and was happy and confident when I left. 
      I surely recommend all of my friends

review:
Hi Dr thank you for your treatment I'm very much satisfied with your treatment. I was frustrated because of dental pain Dr Veena mam made me feel comfortable. Dr Veena mam did painless RCT and I was so relieved after that. 
I would recommend my friends too if any one has a  problem  regarding pain in teeth.
Thank you so much

I am very thank full to Dr.VeenaSura for treating RCT .I was scared of going to dentist but Dr Veena Sura made me very comfortable .Explained what is RCT and very patiently she has done without any pain.
Dr Veena is very good doctor and her treatment is very good, my rootcnal treatment went very well and caps were placed. The teeth are as normal as before and no pain now,

I reported tooth pain, but after I visited they took 1400 saying 2 sitting will be required for cleaning. I went for first sitting and  paid the complete amount and later appointment was scheduled for 2 nd October as per doctor's say, but when I reached I was told doctor was not available. My tooth pain got more severe after cleaning and I ended up visiting another doctor.

I had severe tooth ache and had loose teeth, I was treated by Dr Veena sura and implants were placed and I am absolutely pain free and my teeth alignment is very good. Thanks Dr and I highly recommend the doctor for dental treatments
